name: Mummy Rot
description: Mummy Rot is a curse inflicted by a mummy's touch. The cursed creature can't regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases over time until the creature dies or the curse is removed.
source: Mummy or Mummy Lord melee attack (Rotting Fist)

savingThrow.timing: When hit by the mummy's Rotting Fist attack

effects.description: The cursed target can't regain Hit Points.
The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. This reduction lasts until the curse is removed.
If the curse reduces the target's Hit Point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust.

curing.notes: The curse can be ended by Remove Curse or similar magic. The Hit Point maximum reduction is permanent until cured. A creature that dies from Mummy Rot can only be restored by True Resurrection or Wish, as its body has turned to dust.
